    • getPort

      public int getPort() throws URISyntaxException
      This method converts the scheme from URI to port number. It is limited to the ldap/ldaps schemes. The method could be static however then it cannot be easily mocked in testing.
      Returns:
      port number or -1 if the scheme in given URI is not known
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the URI is not valid

    • getAddresses

      public InetAddress[] getAddresses(String hostname) throws UnknownHostException
      Wraps InetAddress.getAllByName() so that it can be mocked in testing. (mocking static methods is not really possible with Mockito)
      Parameters:
      hostname - hostname string
      Returns:
      array of InetAddress objects
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - if the host cannot be resolved to any IP address

    • isReachable

      public boolean isReachable()
      Go through all IP addresses and find out if they are reachable.
      Returns:
      true if all IP addresses are reachable, false otherwise

    • isWorking

      public boolean isWorking()
      The LDAP server is working only when it is reachable and its connection is not null. This method tries to establish the connection if it is not established already.
      Returns:
      true if it is working

    • search

      public NamingEnumeration<SearchResult> search(String name, String filter, SearchControls cons) throws NamingException
      Lookups the LDAP server.
      Parameters:
      name - base dn for the search
      filter - LDAP filter
      cons - controls for the LDAP request
      Returns:
      LDAP enumeration with the results
      Throws:
      NamingException - naming exception

    • search

      public NamingEnumeration<SearchResult> search(String name, String filter, SearchControls controls, boolean reconnected) throws NamingException
      Perform LDAP search.
      Parameters:
      name - base dn for the search
      filter - LDAP filter
      controls - controls for the LDAP request
      reconnected - flag if the request has failed previously
      Returns:
      LDAP enumeration with the results
      Throws:
      NamingException - naming exception

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the server context.
